definition: that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
(adverbial expression indicating that the attention of the subject of the verb is focused on what they are doing, not distracted by anything else)/just ...ing (and nothing else)

sentences.english: 'And it's a better hiding-place than out here in the country.
sentences.chinese: 那儿是个比乡间更好的藏身的地方。

sentences.english: My master went back to his friends and we took the boat out to sea.
sentences.chinese: 主人回到他的朋友们那儿去了，我们坐船出了海。

sentences.english: Shawn boomed. "There is endless bounty there for both of us.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩低声说，“那儿会给我们俩无尽的礼物。

sentences.english: Where first our marriage-vows were given.
sentences.chinese: 在那儿我们说过新婚的誓言。

sentences.english: Then I knew it was she who had put them there.
sentences.chinese: 然后我知道是她把那些花“放”在那儿的。

sentences.english: He seemed to have no desire to go there; besides, his clothes were not good enough.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎不想去那儿，再加他的衣服也不够体面。

sentences.english: But make no mistake - they are there only in service of the mission.
sentences.chinese: 但是不要搞错，他们在那儿仅仅是是为了完成使命。

sentences.english: She stood with her back to him, staring at the back wall of his house.
sentences.chinese: 她站在那儿，背对着他，目光注视着房子的后墙。

sentences.english: There's a lot to see and do there.
sentences.chinese: 那儿有很多可看的东西和可做的事情。

sentences.english: I went to the West Lake to see them yesterday, there already many people gathered and took pictures of them.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我去西湖边看它们，那儿已经有很多人在拍照了。

sentences.english: Do you think we can sponge a meal from your parents?
sentences.chinese: 你认为我们能从你父母那儿不混顿饭吃了吗？

sentences.english: He wanted to see this grotesque sight, these dead bodies lying there.
sentences.chinese: 他想要看到这种怪诞的景像，这些尸体躺在那儿。

sentences.english: On my way home I stopped at my aunt's.
sentences.chinese: 回家途中我顺便到姑妈那儿去了一会儿。

sentences.english: Go ahead to the registration office first, then to the doctors.
sentences.chinese: 先到挂号处，再到医生那儿。

sentences.english: Do we have to pre-book tours, or can we get them on-site?
sentences.chinese: 我们是必须事先预定旅行，还是可以到那儿再说？

definition: there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
outside/outer surface/abroad/place other than one's home
(of children, parents etc) at one's side/living with one
the front (of)/(in) front/(in) sb's presence/just before (a date)
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment/also written 哪裡|哪里
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment
erhua variant of 旁邊|旁边[pang2 bian1]
